title: Todo App

title: FlashCards
description:
A flashcard app built in Python. Minimal functionality built in. MVC design pattern used with Tkinter as the GUI.

title: Password Manager
description: A password manager built in Python. Support password generation and login search and lookup. MVC and Tkinter.
